nodes.text: Encrust II was a location. According to Princess Leia Organa of the Rebel Alliance, the Clawdite shapeshifter Tunga Arpagion was personal friends with all the members of the Meor nobility that were within 1.3 parsecs of Encrust II by 1 ABY.
Encrust II was mentioned in Star Wars 46, a canon comic written by Kieron Gillen and published by Marvel Comics on April 4, 2018.
